packages.name: AlternativeAutocompletion
packages.description: Fuzzy word completion, based on the contents of the current file.
packages.author: Colin T.A. Gray (colinta)

packages.name: ApacheConf
packages.description: For htaccess and .conf files.  By GreyWyvern, with assist by radiosilence.  <http://www.sublimetext.com/forum/viewtopic.php?f=5&t=856>.
packages.author: GreyWyvern and radiosilence

packages.name: Bracketeer
packages.description: Some bracket manipulation, selection, and insertion commands.
packages.author: Colin T.A. Gray (colinta)

packages.name: Calculate
packages.description: Calculations using python.  Also provides some number-related functions, like counting (across multiple selections).  With contributions from Subhas Dandapani (rdsubhas), Alexander Kirk (akirk), and Kroum Tzanev (kpym)
packages.author: Colin T.A. Gray (colinta)

packages.name: ChangeQuotes
packages.description: Converts single to double or double to single quotes.  Attempts to preserve correct escaping, though this could be improved I'm sure.
packages.author: Colin T.A. Gray (colinta)

packages.name: Clipboard Manager
packages.description: A version of the Sublime Text plugin at <http://www.sublimetext.com/forum/viewtopic.php?f=5&t=2260&start=0> that makes for TextMate-like clipboard history.  Based on Clipboard History, by AJ Palkovic (ajpalkovic) and Martin Aspeli (optilude)
packages.author: Colin T.A. Gray (colinta)

packages.name: Decent Swift Syntax
packages.description: Swift language grammar that doesn't suck.
packages.author: Colin T.A. Gray (colinta)

packages.name: DuplicateSelections
packages.description: If you have an equal number of empty selections (cursors) and selections, this command will place each selection at the corresponding cursor location.
packages.author: Colin T.A. Gray (colinta)

packages.name: ExcludeFromProject
packages.description: Some Side Bar.sublime-menu commands to help with .sublime-project management.
packages.author: Colin T.A. Gray (colinta)

packages.name: Extra Syntax
packages.description: Extra
packages.author: Colin T.A. Gray (colinta)

packages.name: FileDiffs
packages.description: Shows diffs between the current file, or selection(s) in the current file, and clipboard, another file, or unsaved changes.  With contributions from Sebastian Pape (spape) and Jiri Urban (jiriurban)
packages.author: Colin T.A. Gray (colinta)

packages.name: Groupy
packages.description: Stores and opens named file groups
packages.author: Colin T.A. Gray (colinta)

packages.name: MarkAndMove
packages.description: Allows for keyboard-only multiple selections.  Select some stuff, mark it, then move the cursor around and add more marks, recall marks, or move between marks.
packages.author: Colin T.A. Gray (colinta)

packages.name: MoveText
packages.description: Select text and drag it around, or setup a text tunnel to move code from one location to another.
packages.author: Colin T.A. Gray (colinta)

packages.name: Quickfind
packages.description: Works similarly to TextMate's ctrl+s.  But if text is already selected, it will be the default search.  Keep pressing ctrl+s to search for the next instance.
packages.author: Colin T.A. Gray (colinta)

packages.name: ScreencastDirector
packages.description: This is how I make screencasts on <http://colinta.com>.
packages.author: Colin T.A. Gray (colinta)

packages.name: SetSyntax
packages.description: Some generic keyboard bindings for 'Set Syntax:'
packages.author: Colin T.A. Gray (colinta)

packages.name: SimpleMovements
packages.description: Adds caret moving and newline entering commands.
packages.author: Colin T.A. Gray (colinta)

packages.name: StringEncode
packages.description: Converts characters from one encoding to another using a transformation (think HTML entities, not character encodings).
packages.author: Colin T.A. Gray (colinta)

packages.name: TextDebugging
packages.description: Adds prinf-style debugging.
packages.author: Colin T.A. Gray (colinta)

packages.name: TextFormatting
packages.description: Adds text-formatting tricks to Sublime Text.  Mostly for PEP8 formatting.
packages.author: Colin T.A. Gray (colinta)

packages.name: TransposeCharacter
packages.description: Swaps two characters, lines, words, or reverses a selection.  Depending on cursor location and selection(s).
packages.author: Colin T.A. Gray (colinta)

packages.name: zenburn
packages.description: Zenburn color scheme.
packages.author: Colin T.A. Gray (colinta)
